channel.title: Icon [PI]
channel.description: Well I just added a assistant rank and icon to my server and the icon only shows up in yell because I knew how to do that, but how do I make it when assistants talk in chat box the icon shows up?

item.title: Icon [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“akshayp1, post:4, topic:444726”]None of those links work.[/quote]Are you kidding me?.. Change “serber” to “server” use common sense next time… You can’t say the full thing or it gets blocked out.
